tool.name: Defuse Trinity
tool.command: defuse_trinity_analysis.py --input $defuse_results --transcripts $trinity_transcripts --peptides $trinity_orfs --nbases $nbases --min_pep_len $min_pep_len --ticdist $ticdist --readthrough=$readthrough #if 'matched' in str($outputs).split(','): --matched="$matched_output" #end if #if 'aligned' in str($outputs).split(','): --transcript_alignment="$aligned_output" #end if --output $output

param.name: nbases
param.label: Number of bases on either side of the fusion to compare

param.name: min_pep_len
param.label: Minimum length of peptide to report

param.name: ticdist
param.label: Maximum intrachromosomal distance to be classified a Transcription-induced chimera (TIC)

param.name: readthrough
param.label: Number of stop_codons to read through

param.name: outputs
param.label: Additional outputs
param.option: Matched Fusions Trinity Tanscripts and ORFs Tabular
Aligned Fusion and Trinity Transcipts Fasta

tool.help:
**Defuse Results**
Verifies DeFuse_ fusion predictions in results.tsv with TrinityRNAseq_ assembled transcripts and ORFs.
This program relies on the header line of the results.tsv to determine which columns to use for analysis.
.. _DeFuse: http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/defuse .. _TrinityRNAseq: http://trinityrnaseq.github.io/
